Reviews.Title: Excellent basic laptop for anyone looking to save money.
Reviews.Author: Jared72886
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop from Micro Center because I saw it on sale for $279 and needed a new computer. I basically try to keep things until they go bad, my computer previous to this one was like a 1996 Award Tower with a basic Dell Screen. Very slow, with a 6 GB hard drive. It got to the point where it was too slow for me to do my work efficiently and couldn't even watch 360p videos on Youtube. I always try to save money and try to purchase items that offer the most for the money. This laptop was an excellent choice. I've had it for about a month so far and I am so happy with it. The performance is excellent, its not sluggish at all, the keyboard is nice and comfortable, and the HD graphics and LED screen are wonderful. Two minor complaints I have is that I couldn't connect to my WiFi and had no idea why it kept disconnecting. I had to uninstall the Norton virus protection that came with the computer and then the internet is working fine. It kept blocking it and driving me crazy, so now that it is gone everything is perfect. The speakers aren't too great either. I work from home and have a two screen setup and wish the audio was just a little bit louder because I sometimes watch videos or the news. I would opt for this model because it is the Intel processor and you can't go wrong with it. The screen is 15.6 HD LED LCD and is a great size. I use it more as a desktop computer so its just fine for me, someone who takes their computer on the go a lot more might want something a bit smaller in size. The hard drive is 282 GB which is huge and coming from a 6 GB HD...yes 6 where I literally had to delete photos after uploading them to conserve space. The drive is more then enough. The battery life is roughly 4 hours, and when you have the screen dim it lasts a bit longer. I typically have the screen dim after a few minutes and sleep after 15 minute to extend the life. I have no problem watching Youtube videos in 1080p and the quality is fantastic. I have also purchased a TV show in HD from Amazon and streamed it and the quality is excellent. Even with the computer being a lot more expensive on amazon it is still a great computer to consider. I also love the HDMI input on the side where I have hooked the laptop up to my 47" Vizio TV and it looked perfect. My girlfriend has a Macbook Pro which is almost $1,000 more and I just can't see the point. She doesn't even have an HDMI port and it has a smaller screen and I can't justify why someone would pay so much more. If you want a laptop that is fast, perfect for everyday use with all the bells and whistles that come standard...this is an excellent choice. There was no reviews for me to read prior to purchasing which made me nervous but I still took the leap, hopefully this will help people who are considering.

Reviews.Title: Nice Budget Notebook - EASY MEMORY UPGRADE
Reviews.Author: John McMahon
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty nice notebook. The wide screen is crisp and clear. Default resolution of 1366 x 768 is quite acceptable. I paid 280 and bought a 4 GB memory module for 18 bucks. If you are upgrading the memory remove ALL the screws on the bottom of the notebook. Don't forget the 4 screws inside the battery compartment, and keep them separate from the others as they are smaller. All the other screws are the same size. Once all the screws are removed the back should come off. There are no ribbon cables to worry about. You just set the notebook upside down on a cloth on a table, remove all screws and pull the back plastic off. My fingernails are short and I was still able to gently pry the back off without a tool. If the DVD door cover comes off don't panic, just snap it back into place. Insert memory in the blank slot and screw it back together. remove the entire Presto, you have 6 GB memory. This is a snappy little notebook for under 300 clams. My Scores are Processor 5.3, RAM 5.5, Graphics 4.3, Gaming Graphics 5.7, Hard Disk 5.9.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Turner
Reviews.Content: Like Jared, I also picked this up at Micro Center.  In my case, for only $249!  As someone who remembers working on IBM XT personal computers, it is astounding to consider the power and performance that can now be had for a pittance.I am an Apple user, but so far I have been reasonably well impressed with Windows 7.  I downloaded Open Office (I absolutely detest the Microsoft "ribbon" interface) which runs great, and the machine streams movies well.  BTW, apparently it is running a 64 bit version of Windows.I did install 4 megs of additional memory at the suggestion of the sales guy - it cost about $20 - so I cannot swear the streaming would be quite as good with only 2 meg.  I can also attest to the fact that you do indeed have to remove 20-something screws and take off the back of the case to install ram.  Though the whole process still only took about 20 minutes.The keyboard is a little weird, in that the keys are sort of like large Chiclets that kind of float over the body of the machine, which tells me it could get messy for users who eat while using their computers.  This is the only weak spot I have noticed.  It is also true that you have to burn your own recovery disks for Windows, but given the price, I can't beef about that.Overall, a very good machine for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good entry level laptop
Reviews.Author: Noonoo Dog "Clueless Shopper"
Reviews.Content: My dear wife needs a basic laptop to do her Turbo tax and net surfing.This machine fits the bill.I got this from Fry's for about $280.I added 4G of RAM on top of the current 2G RAM (total of 6G).The machine has two memory slots.  Mercifully, the existing RAM is a single module 2G RAM so that leaves another slot open (instead of having two modules with 1G each).As mentioned in some previous reviews, there are 20 "long" screws in the back that need to be removed.On top of that, there are 4 "short" screws (3 in a row, and the forth on the other side) in the memory bay.These need to be removed too (so a total of 24 screws).The screws were put in rather tight and I needed a wrench (on the screw driver) to unscrew some of the screws.Putting back the back cover was a bit tricky.  You need to make sure that the cover lines up with the two front circular audio ports (headphones + mike).The machine came with little bloatwares and I did not have any problem uninstalling them.The laptop is not the best looking laptop (I was spoiled by my daughter's ultrabook which came in an aluminum chassis).However, it is not hideous either.  It looks rather "functional".The machine has an Intel B815 processor - I believe this is a celeron processor (dual core) - this is a low-end Intel processor.It cold booted Window 7 in about a minute - not too bad.This is my "Window Experience Index":Processor = 5.2Memory = 7.1Graphics = 4.1Gaming graphics = 4.4Primary hard disk = 5.9I have done some web surfing and viewed HD contents on youtube.The machine handle these tasks with no problem.(as compared to those blasted netbooks)I do not anticipate any issue when running Turbo-Tax or large Excel spreadsheets.On the other hand, I am pretty sure the machine will choke on latest/greatest games or heavy duty video processing.I could not comment on the battery life - have not tested this yet.(I expect this to be decent since the machine comes with a 6-cell battery and celeron processor is not that power hungry.)The AC brick does not get hot - that is good.The machine is pretty quiet even when viewing HD content on youtube.The fan seems to kick in very seldom and it is not loud when it kicks in.The DVD-ROM is rather loud (when used), though.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I use the internet alot and three years is about the lifetime of my computer.  I was a bit hesitant to go with Acer, but having spent $500 for a HP laptop just 3 years ago, I opted for a budget model.  I have not had any of the issues that negative reviewers have found.  The keyboard is very comfortable.  The computer is very light compared to my old model, but faster.  I've been advised to not get anything less than 1.6 GHz processor for using You Tube, and the 1.3 GHz processor on this model is more than adequate to view You Tube videos without issue.  I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: OK except for internet explorer bug which keeps skype from working
Reviews.Author: DanS "fiscalconservative"
Reviews.Content: It works great except that I kept getting a javascipt error when I tried to open Yahoo mail in internet explorer (they are using IE9) which more importantly  kept me from installing skype.  I solved the problem by doing the following.(You may also solve the problem by rolling back IE9 to IE8) Go to Windows Start -> All Programs -> Accessories -> Right click on Command Prompt, select 'Run as administrator'.The Command Prompt window should show:C:\Windows\SysWoW64>If what you are seeing is:C:\Windows\System32>then in the Command Prompt type: cd..  (2 dots are important) and press Enter.Now you should see this in the Command Prompt:C:\Windows>Next type cd syswow64 and press Enter.Now you should see this in the Command Prompt:C:\Windows\SysWoW64>Type this and then press Enter:regsvr32 jscript.dllNext type this and press Enter:regsvr32 jscript9.dllNext type this and press Enter:regsvr32 vbscript.dllAfter each Enter you should receive a message saying that DllRegisterServer in XXX.dll succeeded.Reboot your computer.Make now the test showing if your Internet Explorer can execute JavaScript.Open in your Internet Explorer (no other browser but only IE, 32-bit version) this page:[...]

Reviews.Title: A little slow on the uptake
Reviews.Author: RobertG "RobertG"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the purchase and the physical computer was in very good condition.  The processor is a little slow, but for the price I paid a few nanoseconds wait time is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: Keys are sticking
Reviews.Author: C. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I purchased this computer because it was very cheap at MicoCenter. I've been pretty pleased with it over the past 9 months. The t button on the keyboard sticks at times and over the past two weeks the a button has begun to stick. Besides that I am quite satisfied.

Reviews.Title: fast and nice screen
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: Nice little computer.  Very fast, and the screen is vivid.  I dislike the one long left and right click bar combined.  Happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good with Windows XP
Reviews.Author: Walters Judson Group "BOSTON DANIEL"
Reviews.Content: We sold a few of these laptops and none have beenreturned by our customers.  We REMOVED windows 7and replaced it with WINDOWS X P  for better legacyprograms options.  All 35 sold, none returned.This Laptop is not certainly not the fastest, thoughit worked faster with X P.  The built in Camera is onlyso-so, and works fine for Internet viewing, etc.Those writing negative reviews must have gotten badunits - and in our opinion 2 GB  of DDR3 is hardlyenough to run Windows 7, though it will run (butnot your older programs).  Brandon Eli Roman, TheWalters Judson Group.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: PaulRingo
Reviews.Content: Perfect for an student or someone without bigger expectations on a PC. Video card would better, but it is fine for the price.

Reviews.Title: A great Laptop for the price:
Reviews.Author: Praise The Lord, Always
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife as she was having trouble with her other Acer, and Acer told me it would cost $199+ s/h to "fix". After I got this one, my son "fixed" hers, only overloaded from all of the games that she plays with her friends on the Internet; so now, he has her old one and my wife has the new one. My only complaint with this one, is the lack of memory cards that can be used on it compared to the original.  +JMJ+  P.S.: I forgot to mention the very speedy service from SAS Global Trading: It took only one day for me to get this  and it came in perfect condition. They should get more than 5-stars.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: double-r
Reviews.Content: Bought this laptop for my aunt who just needs it for her work using office programs.It's a great laptop for just normal stuff..internet, small games.Will buy this laptop again.

Reviews.Title: Acer Aspire AS5349-2899 15.6-Inch
Reviews.Author: Miguel Azuaje
Reviews.Content: The shipping was fast! This laptop is beautiful compared to my old pc pentium4 desktop, this laptop is lightning. this new processor celeron dual core B815 is fast! with 2Gb RAM is fast lde causes, I would buy another 4GB memory, an hour add up to 6Gb memory. to change the memory just have to unscrew all the screws in the back and the lid comes very easy. before touching any electronic part of the laptop, you have to release the static from your body. I am very happy with this laptop, I recommend this PC. I congratulate the vendor to offer this excellent product!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!
Reviews.Author: snam
Reviews.Content: This product is a waste of money and time!! I recently purchased this laptop because of its price. Since im a poor college student that was all I could afford. As soon as I started using the touch pad malfunctioned and the fan did not work. It also powers down randomly without any notice and restarts on its own. I need a laptop to do my school work, essays, homework but this laptop is making it impossible for me to do well in college. I have lost so much work because of this problem. I tried to get it fixed and they ended up replacing the harddrive and now want me to pay for the recovery disc because all of my data has been removed. I shouldnt be charged anything from acer! My warantee hasnt expired yet why do I have to pay for what they did wrong. I've almost a month to get this fixed and its just very disappointing and inconvenient.PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS LAPTOP OR ANYTING FROM ACER. You cannot trust this company with any of its products. If you are reading this please go do yourself a favor and get a laptop from any other company.

Reviews.Title: Amazing laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: jab
Reviews.Content: I was computer-less after both my hp mini and my macbook ceased working this past January. Being on a budget, I found this laptop for 374 and no shipping costs. A month into owning it and i love it.  I'll be using this as my central computer until I can afford another macbook.Amazing features and the cost is exceptional.

Reviews.Title: Reliable little bugger
Reviews.Author: Lee H.
Reviews.Content: This laptop was perfect for me and my daughter. We have owned this laptop for about two years now, and it is still functioning like the day we bought it. The biggest issue so far is the keyboard, (which isn't the greatest quality), which wore out at the year and a half mark. A $20 replacement keyboard works fine.This is my daughter's school and recreation computer. She uses it like a desktop, doing everything from writing school papers to playing heavily modded Minecraft. And while the laptop is shrieking protest, it can and will suffer through Minecraft at 20-something frames per second, without any upgrades whatsoever to the hardware.Pros:- Reliable. Will function for weeks on end without a reboot. Ours has endured two years of heavy use and has shown minimal signs of wear.- Easy to use. We got the laptop out of the box and had it working within two hours. Laptop needs little/no modification of settings for general usage.- The screen. Nice, large screen with multiple brightness options. My daughter rarely complains of eye strain.- USB ports. This laptop has 3 USB ports, which I use for a wired keyboard, a mouse and a flash drive. USB ports are on the sides of the laptop, which is an annoyance to some people. (We personally prefer it.)Cons:- Keyboard. The keyboard is very, very difficult to clean and the keys get stuck after awhile. Easily fixed by purchasing a wired keyboard.This is the perfect laptop for somebody that wants a machine to goof around with, surf the internet and some basic gaming, without messing with a lot of settings. Quick and easy startup with minimal tweaking needed.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for me
Reviews.Author: chefbarb
Reviews.Content: I love this computer and the price was just amazing. So much so that my son in law decided to get one as well.

Reviews.Title: Perfect laptop at perfect price
Reviews.Author: Hamed Haghnazar
Reviews.Content: I could not ask for a better laptop and the price is a steal.  I may buy another soon.  Very durable, survives falls, have not had any issues in 3 months since I bought it.

Reviews.Title: janetsi venezuela
Reviews.Author: Janetsi Ramon Cordero "Janetsi"
Reviews.Content: este producto esta bien en la condiciones esperadas, entrega por el vendedor a tiempo, sin ningún problema segun lo requerido gracias, lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: romulo acevedo
Reviews.Content: se recomienda muy buen vendedor llego puntual como lo esperaba, fue el producto que pedi en muy buen estado. gracias

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Bill Nottingham
Reviews.Content: I got the item quickly and it was exactly as described. It's always great getting what was advertised at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop for the price....
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Bought this laptop for my 14 year old for his graduation gift. Overall great basic laptop for a great price. He is a gamer and has downloaded a few games onto the computer and everything seems to be working great at the moment. Good laptop for someone who is not going to be doing too much on it. It has shut down on it's own a few times but other then that no major issues. It has a very nice screen and picture.

Reviews.Title: Nice Laptop!!
Reviews.Author: DAVIS93
Reviews.Content: Been having my Laptop for 6 months and I love it...Not once have I had one Problem...The Screen is Great Color and Vibrant also...

Reviews.Title: very good fast shipping
Reviews.Author: george johnson
Reviews.Content: i bought this laptop for my daugther on i was very please with it she love it nice screen work very fast i would recomend it to anyone great price too i really please with the shipping time

Reviews.Title: Just what it was supposed to be
Reviews.Author: TM
Reviews.Content: Bought this laptop for price which was excellent and the brand.  This is my second Acer laptop and I am well pleased, it is light fast and does exactly what it is supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: my laptop
Reviews.Author: chalande alexis
Reviews.Content: i love my laptop so much.every morning i wake up it's next to me.am actually using it now it's the best.i just love it.it's been a year and no problem so far.it's exactly the way it was when i fist got it expect for a little nail polish pain,t while doing my nail.it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: WORST LAPTOP...EVER!!!!
Reviews.Author: lkpoib
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase this because of price and the specs. But apparently this computer is probably worth LESS than the $359.00 price! I wasted my money on this crumby laptop. This is the speed. I could take a shower, use the restroom, cook something, watch 3 or 4 movies, take another shower, eat a meal and it would still be opening a program. I recommend that you stay away from buying this.

Reviews.Title: Windows 7 vs. Windows XP
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: [[ASIN:B006ITP692 Acer Aspire AS5349-2899 15.6-Inch Laptop (Gray)]The Acer Aspire AS5349-2899 15.6-inch Laptop works well and looks good (nice display).  Windows 7 causes me to dislike using the Acer Aspire because I've become used to using Windows XP for many years and, being 77 years old, I'm a slow learner. Maybe I'll enjoy using it after I've learned more about Windows 7. sigh.

Reviews.Title: do not buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Virginia
Reviews.Content: I have this laptop in a dark red. This laptop brand has alot of issues electrical. Also to buy replacement parts or external components is a crap shoot....even to buy an ac adapter..they seem to be hard to match up...the batteries only last like for 1.5 years....then you have to spend like $100 to get a new one...if you buy it from the manufacturer...which I am not so sure if ACER even has their own...I think you have to buy one that is ACER "compatible"...I have read reviews about the replacement batteries and they last people like 3 months.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Celeron B815 Processor 1.6GHz (2MB Cache)
2GB SDRAM RAM
320GB 5400RPM Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen, Intel HD Graphics
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit, 4 hours Battery Life
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Aspire AS5349-2899 15.6-Inch Laptop (Gray)
